entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -21.4°C

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
